Enum Class AnsiColor

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<AnsiColor>
it.polimi.ingsw.galaxytrucker.View.Trials.AnsiColor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<AnsiColor>, Constable
public enum AnsiColor extends Enum<AnsiColor>
The AnsiColor enum represents ANSI color codes for foreground and background text styling. It provides methods to generate ANSI escape codes for text formatting in the terminal.

  • Nested Class Summary
